All rights reserved. @@ -249,3 +249,3 @@ - * {@return a new confined arena} Segments allocated with the confined arena can be - * {@linkplain MemorySegment#isAccessibleBy(Thread) accessed} by the thread - * that created the arena, the arena's owner thread. + * {@return a new confined arena} Segments allocated with the confined arena can + * only be {@linkplain MemorySegment#isAccessibleBy(Thread) accessed} by the + * thread that created the arena, the arena's owner thread.
